projects.name: Energy Consumption Prediction API
projects.description: A RESTful API designed to predict energy consumption over 24 time intervals using the Appliances Energy Prediction dataset. The system accepts 43 environmental input features, scales them with MinMaxScaler, and performs predictions using an XGBoost model. Built with FastAPI and packaged using Docker, the project offers a scalable and efficient backend for energy optimization solutions.

projects.name: Real-Time Face Recognition App
projects.technology: Streamlit · OpenCV · Face Recognition · dlib · Python
projects.description: This application performs real-time face recognition using webcam input, based on user-uploaded ID photos. Recognized faces are marked with a green box and label, while unrecognized ones are shown with a red box and 'Unknown' tag. The app offers an intuitive Streamlit-based interface for uploading photos and starting the live camera stream with automatic face matching.

projects.name: Simple E-Commerce System with Python
